price: Yet they worship besides Allah that which can neither benefit nor harm them; the disbeliever always collaborates against his Lord[31].
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡۗ وَكَانَ ٱلۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرٗا
footnotes: [31] i.e., helping and defending those who rebel against Allah.
